name: VR Redux
description: A collection of VR related tweaks, trying to make the game more `VR native`.

english.ui_prop_key_vr_master_key_desc: Virtual Key, used to open any doors you have the key for
english.ui_prop_key_vr_master_swipecard_desc: Virtual Keycard, used to operate any keycard readers you have the keycard for

options.name: Smaller head collider
options.tooltip: Shrinks the size of 47's head collider, making agility areas easier to use

options.name: Hip Holster (Pistols)
options.tooltip: Adds a hip holster that can hold a single pistol, rather than it sharing a common inventory on your chest

options.name: Disable interaction zone visual aid
options.tooltip: Disables the highlight zones when a VR interaction is available (Might make it harder to find the sweet spot)

options.name: Disable key and keycard autoequip
options.tooltip: Disables the automatic equipping of the Virtual Key and Keycard when approaching locked doors
